str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ana and pauo; to repose (be exempt), remain); by implication, to refresh.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
